Manufacturing

Predictive Maintenance Revolution at InnoTech Factory

Challenge: InnoTech, a mid-sized manufacturing company with €35M annual revenue, faced costly equipment failures and production delays. Their maintenance was reactive, data was scattered across different systems, and they lacked the expertise to implement predictive maintenance.

Solution: Our CDO as a Service team implemented a comprehensive data strategy focused on integrating production data from disparate systems into a centralized data lake, developing predictive maintenance models using machine learning, creating real-time dashboards for maintenance teams, and training local staff on data maintenance and model updates.

37%

Reduction in Unplanned Downtime

€420K

Annual Savings

9%

OEE Increase
